review_text: had no idea about decorating cakes,by this booklet ,now i can say that following the instructions and have the will and patience plus practicing,one day i wont be ashamed ofmy cakes. i added an image of a cake i made according to this book lessons, which i advice anyone who is interested; to get this book...
product_name: Wilton Decorating Cakes Book (The Wilton school)
